name: Project Lazarus (itch)
description:
In the year 2029, the world is on the brink of extinction due to global warming.  Your team and you a group of scientists are working towards a solution.  But at the most crucial moment the project fails and has repercussions, but not beyond repair.  What will you choose?  Saving the world      || OR ||     Saving your friends. Choose wisely and whatever decision you make... ... Make it count!!!

Existing Assets Used:

Some sound assets from 'Soundly' .
